text: The First Evil is the final Big Bad of Buffy the Vampire Slayer. It is a shapeshifting form of evil. It first appeared in the third season episode "Amends". ==Fictional biography== The First Evil is a non corporeal being that can shapeshift into people who died. ==Analysis== The First Evil is considered the Buffyverse equivalent of Satan.
